EventActionInfo

Information about an event action

EventActionInfo
EventActionInfo() : type(EventActionConfiguration::NONE), triggerId(0), instanceId(0)

Default constructor

EventActionInfo
EventActionInfo(
const EventActionConfiguration::Type type,
const uint8 triggerId,
const uint8 instanceId
) : type(type), triggerId(triggerId), instanceId(instanceId)
type
EventActionConfiguration::Type type

Configured EventActionConfiguration::Type

triggerId
uint8 triggerId

Associated event trigger instance

instanceId
uint8 instanceId

Instance ID of the action

EventActionStatus

A vector of EventActionInfo
